intro: Team up as Santa and Mrs. Claus in a wild showdown against Krampus and his wicked crew—save Christmas and restore peace to the North Pole!
description:
"No More Snow" is a fast-paced, action-packed top-down shooter where Christmas itself hangs in the balance! Step into the boots of Santa Claus (or Mrs. Claus in co-op mode) and battle through 10 snowy, danger-filled levels, from the eerie depths of a graveyard to Santa’s bustling workshop. With vibrant, cartoonish low-poly graphics, No More Snow delivers a holiday adventure full of festive chaos and explosive fun.

Armed with an arsenal of holiday-themed weapons, including rifles, shotguns, and even a flamethrower, take on hordes of twisted enemies like zombie elves, vicious snowmen, and other fiendish creatures. Feeling close combat? Wield powerful melee weapons, like Santa’s axe or a candy cane club, and clear your path to victory. Face 8 epic boss battles against formidable foes, including the Snowman King, the Grim Reaper, and the ultimate villain, Krampus.

Can you survive the onslaught and save Christmas from eternal darkness? Join the fight, conquer the chaos, and bring holiday cheer back to the North Pole in No More Snow!
